<<<<<<< HEAD
A reverse to Mr. Oliver's sermon of spiritual worship a sermon on the same subject preached before the Lord Mayor, at St. Paul's Church, August 26th. 1660 / by Matthew Poole now reprinted and may serve as an answer to the aforesaid sermon. Poole, Matthew, 1624-1679.
[6], 24 p.
Printed for A. Baldwin ..., London : 1698.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
=======

[6], 24 p.
Printed for A. Baldwin ..., London : 1698.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
